website_summaries.verdict: This unit makes warm, gooey quesadillas with a crispy outer shell. Quickly creates 10 inch quesadillas with your favorite ingredients in just 3-4 minutes.
pros: Deep-dish pockets hold loads of cheese, salsa, and meat, and outer ridge keeps it all in for mess-free meals
Nonstick cooking surface wipes clean fast so you can fill your quesadilla cravings anytime
It is super easy to clean up - just wipe with a damp cloth
cons: The nonstick coating may start to bubble up and flake off

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Broke the First Time Used
customer_reviews.text: As a George Foreman grill owner, I was happy to find a Quesadilla maker to use for my private chef business. I followed the instructions included and was extremely disappointed with this product! During the first use, I closed the cover and pressed down gently, as instructed, and the top of the Quesadilla maker collapsed! Shards of broken plastic cut my hand and fell into the machine. The top should not be hollow and so thin, as to break when pressed lightly. I do not recommend this product; especially for kids that want to experiment. Very dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Roddy Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT but the nonstick coating flakes off
customer_reviews.text: Makes fantastic quesadillas! My only issue with this particular quesadilla maker is that, with regular use, the "George Tough Nonstick Coating for easy cleanup" starts to bubble up and flake off. I have only ever cleaned it with paper towels immediately after each use. I've had this item for a lil over a year and I'm currently shopping for a new one -- probably not a George Foreman. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Ky Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and aggravation. Advertised as having deep pockets - false while all of the cheese is forced out onto the countertop. I previously owned another brand and it was super but wore out over time. I'm going back to my original brand of quesadilla maker which accepted meat and cheese. This George Foreman brand will take a sprinkle of ingredients and nothing more. Should have called it is quesadilla cracker grill because that is how much filling you can accomplish. Wasted money on ingredients and lost the complete chance at making a meal which is what my family loved. Save your money unless all you want is a cracker quesadilla. Sent my item back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Love this!! Great Value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to clean and it does make beautiful quesidillas. I don't like the flimsy closure, it not having an off button, and you need tortillas bigger than 10 inches for it to seal the tortilla. We used 10 inch tortillas and you can tell from the picture there was a little big of leakage but look how beautiful it is. ;) Also, it is super easy to clean even when the ozzing cheese leaks out. We just wiped a paper towel over it and it came right up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Westberry

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle
customer_reviews.text: My quesadilla maker died after 10+ years. I bought this particular quesadilla maker for myself & one for my brother-in-law for father's day as well. I used it once. The handle broke. :( SO embarrassing! He's returning it without even opening it. It's worth paying for shipping $5.99. I guess you get what you pay for~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk. Bad Design.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item, there was a strange line on the front latch that I thought was a part of the design. After just a few uses, the latch snapped off completely and I could no longer use the item. Aside from that, the oil from the cheese pools around the edge and isn't the easiest to clean. Other quesadilla makers have a drainage hold that allows grease to pour into a cup. That would have been a much better design. Not satisfied with this product in the slightest. I'll just go back to making quesadillas the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery D. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old Santa Fe quesadilla maker. It got good reviews but I would not recommend. Cheaply made. Cord is very short. It is light and easy to fall off a counter with the short cord. Clumsy to handle because the plastic gets so hot and you must use oven mitts to open or close. There is no "pad" on top to push on to close. I think it is dangerous and could be made much safer for such a simple product. I got a new version of my old Santa Fe on Ebay. That's what I would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Gail G

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used this, we gently closed the maker. We went to open it at the top caved completely in! The one quesadilla we made had no cheese in the first half of the quesadilla because all the cheese squeezed out onto our counter! Do not recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, better than using the skillet
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because in this house- we KNOW quesadillas! This is legit, you just can’t make super thick loaded ones like you could in the skillet. Overall, wonderful, as advertised. Arrived in perfect condition, no chipped or broken pieces. Works perfectly, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katie Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: I just made my first quesadilla and it works well. However, unless you're making the thinnest/most boring quesadilla you're going to have to push down on the lid to get it to cook the tortilla all the way. This explains the reviews who said the lid caved in. Also, the does seal the edges of the tortillas together IF you can line them up perfectly. If you don't line them up then there is some overflow. Overall, I like it. Just be careful when pushing down the lid. I used a roll of paper towels to make sure there's even pressure so the lid doesn't break.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cary

customer_reviews.title: So fun to experiment with!
customer_reviews.text: Screw plain ol' cheese quesadillas. If you're mindful of the triangle sectioning, you can shove all kinds of fun things into it. Our favorite is pizza (some sauce, peppos, cheese), and weirdly enough apple pie.. Some pie filling, butter the outside of the tortilla and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon- you won't be disappointed. Does NOT have an auto off or a timer, so be mindful and babysit it or things will burn. Cleaning is a BREEZE, as the wells collect any run off that isn't too extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Amalaine

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what we need for our quesadillas. One disappointment is that the latch is not spring loaded or anything. When we store it, it tends to work its way open with the loose latch. Functionality is great though. You cannot immerse this in water to wash it, as with all other products like this. I am not concerned enough to return it, but if you would be concerned if the latch did not stay closed due to lack of spring loaded, you may consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Wingbat

customer_reviews.title: Can’t fill your quesadilla too much
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. I wash the plates removed for washing and the black button in the front that you push down to lock it gets easily stuck. Then the lid is too hot to push down on to unlock it, so you have to get a towel and push down on the lid with all your might to get the button unstick. Can’t put much stuff inside your quesadilla but cheese or it won’t close. But it taste great and my kids mostly just want cheese anyway. It was worth the price but it’s not for you if you want to fill your quesadilla with meet and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came on time and in perfect condition. Cleaned it, cooked up some taco meat, and made me a bunch of quesadillas for the family. They were in love and wanted seconds!! Going to do chicken next time as ive already been asked to make more!! Cleaning was a bit of a hassle but i have the hamburger one also and im just assuming good ole george wants us to suffer after using his product to make delicious meals!!
customer_reviews.author: pedikeensTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 1st Quesadilla Maker. Very easy to use. Plug it, wait for ready light to go out, place Quesadilla in it, close the lid, and remove 5-mins later. We have been making the Quesadillas about 1x per week since getting it. Chicken & Cheese, or Beef & cheese The only thing that doesn't make sense to me is the green ready light. When it goes out, it is ready to use. I think logically speaking, when the ready light lights, it would be ready, but it is opposite. When it goes off it is ready. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: James Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Cooking Tool
customer_reviews.text: It works great and I appreciate the non-stock aspect. I also appreciate that it stands on its side for easy storage. I cook with it a lot since it makes a quick meal of snack for the kids. My only dislike is that this version doesn't have s rubber pad where you would press it closed while cooking (so that you're not touching a hot surface).
customer_reviews.author: CPREISER000

customer_reviews.title: I love this! makes awesome Quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: I love this! makes awesome Quesadillas, yes it may over flow if you over stuff, but i havent found that to be a deal breaker, i read in reviews that it was made very poorly, i am a Gadget queen and disagree totally, to clean just wipe while still hot , dont put harsh products or submerge , just like all appliances made today. i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises A. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: quesadillas anyone?
customer_reviews.text: So this is our 3rd quesadilla maker. The old one was one we bought from Aldi's and it lasted many years. Kids scratched the teflon, so it was time to replace. The George Foreman was the best price point for our family. We love the way it crisps the tortilla. Better than our old one. Only issue I see so far is that the back half seems to cook faster than the front half. So as long as we rotate it mid cooking time, they come out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Boer

customer_reviews.title: Finally Eating Quesadilla's Again!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this looking for a better way to make quesadilla's then on my regular George Foreman grill. I have only used it twice but it has made nearly perfect meals both times. The only negative I can see is that the grills are not removable making cleaning a little difficult, but not impossible. The grill heats up in about the same amount of time it takes to gather and assemble my ingredients. Cooks in less than 5 minutes. I should have bought this thing years ago!
customer_reviews.author: GrandSlambert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to make quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Super easy to use. Clean up is a breeze. 3 minutes to cook a quesadilla that was browned evenly. I prepared 1 while cooking another. Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read the booklet before using!
customer_reviews.text: The housing is not real sturdy, as some prople experienced but if the unit is handled properly that should not be a problem. The booklet says not to push down on the unit as it could damage the hinge. There was no problem with the cooking of the unit. You do have to make sure what is cooked because it will spill out. But the instruction book clearly states all of that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I love quesadillas. But this makes it so easy - especially clean up. 3-4 minutes to cook, wipe and done. I have started experimenting with brie, apples and bacon, roasted veggies with cheddar, tomatoes basil and fresh mozzarella, and even desserts! Easy dinner any night just from leftovers in the fridge. This even keeps the edges together and marks for 6 slices.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great quesadilla maker!
customer_reviews.text: The family loves quesadillas and this device makes it easy. Just a note to mention that you can also make just a half quesadilla using one tortilla if you would like and it turns out perfect. I've made shredded chicken quesadillas as well as breakfast quesadillas with scrambled eggs and bacon for my family!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Poor plastic quality
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use it 2 times before the plastic broke down.
customer_reviews.author: Mayela

customer_reviews.title: Power cord too short!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and Super easy to clean. Love how it heats up and the light tells you it's ready, put your prepared Quesadilla on it and close the lid. Minutes later the other light goes off and it's done. My only complaint is the cord is incredibly short, I mean stupidly short.
customer_reviews.author: RASTA+

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Barely any room for fillings if you want to easily latch it. Put in a bit too much filling and you have to push down on the top to latch, except that the top part is hollow and the plastic breaks exposing the heating element inside. Now I have a sliced hand from the plastic, and a circular brand on my thumb from the heating element inside.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until the handle broke.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this and make some quesadillas. I would’ve given it 5 stars but the tiny plastic piece inside the handle that latches it shut broke after the first use and it wasn’t from overstuffing. Everything else about it is perfect but instead of a cheap plastic handle maybe something else would be a little more durable. No fault of the seller, just poor craftsmanship by the manufacturer. I contacted the manufacturer and they want me to cut the cord off the old one and pay $7.50 shipping. So much for a manufacturer’s warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hashman

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent my Quesadillas came out excellent.. no sticking or mess can't wait to make other different quesadillas.. glad I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Courageouslady

customer_reviews.title: Makes Quesadillas super fast 1 tip put some cheese on the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Dose the intended job very well. Makes Quesadillas super fast 1 tip put some cheese on the top of the upper Tortilla befor you close the lid down then let the machine do it's job and it will be a nice crispy cheese top on you meal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most useless things I have ever purchased on Amazon. It broke after the first quesadilla I made. And the first and only one made smelled and tasted like chemicals. If I could give zero stars, I would have. I don't write a lot of reviews but this was so bad and pathetic, I had to. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I had one years ago and it was a smaller one. It got worn out and metal utensils were used on it which ruined it. As soon as I saw this large one, I had to have it. No one is allowed to use it but me. I love it. Quick, easy meals and the menu is endless. Make your own omelets, snacks, meat and cheese or anything you so desire. Easy to use, easy to clean and stores nicely. I love it,
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Broke first on use
customer_reviews.text: Lid smashed in with gentle pressure on first use. Poor product design.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great but you can't put much in between the tortillas
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say that I don't like about it is you can't make thick quesadillas. They have to be really thin meaning you can't put much stuff in between each tortilla. The good thing I liked was that everything is non-stick so when the cheese squeezed out the sides it wiped right off with a paper towel. Also it's very large which we liked.
customer_reviews.author: chickenlady4

customer_reviews.title: I sorta kinda like it
customer_reviews.text: This machine works well but you have to be careful how much you place inside the quesadilla because when the lid comes down.... smoosh all the insides leak out. It has an overflow section which is great but still.... smoosh. It also takes a while to work. I thought it would be more like the grill but it isn't, it takes a while for it to slowly toast from the middle out.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Havens

customer_reviews.title: Hinge broke on second use.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great except for the fact that the hinge that closes it broke on the second time I used it. I saw other reviews that said the same thing but I decided to take a chance. Given the name George Foreman is on it I expected more (I've had a George Foreman grill for almost 15 years and it is as good as the day I first got it). Now I have to put a towel on top of the maker and push down in order to cook the quesadillas right. I wouldn't recommend this product for that reason. Otherwise, it does get hot and wipes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean and works great for kids to make quick snacks
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time it makes perfect quesadillas, non stick so any excess just wipes right off. warms up quickly easy to use my 12 year old uses it all the time to make herself a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: busymom

customer_reviews.title: Good idea poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: It works, barely. I wish the pockets were a little deeper. Works just OK if only making a cheese quesadilla, but not very good if adding chicken and other ingredients. I have already gone back to using microwave. This will probably end up at Salvation Army Thrift Store or Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Seekohog

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my LIFE??!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually Love this product! It's way more than just a simple quesadilla maker! Though it makes FABULOUS, melt in your mouth, warm , gooey really STUFFED Quesadilla's!! We actually make grilled cheese, peanut butter & jelly, ( for real), hazelnut spread and banana's (yessss), cream cheese, (regular or your choice of flavor) and strawberries sliced, taco's & all kinds of food! The creations are as ENDLESS as your imagination!!! ~~Mrs.Very PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received this quesadilla maker and am impressed by the quality and performance. Heats up quickly and the results are fantastic. Nice and brown and crisp and hot on the inside. Would highly recommend this item. I own quite a few George Foreman products and all are great.
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: but it is pretty basic. Would be nice if it had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the intended purpose, but it is pretty basic. Would be nice if it had a light or timer to indicate when the quesadilla is ready. Instead, you have to set your own timer. You also cannot prepare the quesadilla on the maker you have to do it on a plate and then lift it onto the maker, which is potentially an accident waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister. First time she used it the top broke. It is hollow inside so any pressure used in closing it will cause the top to break
customer_reviews.author: Angela N. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good but handle breaks in front
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this product when I first got it because you can put anything you want in it to make a tasty quesadilla. I was so sad when only 2 weeks in the front handle broke off so now it doesn’t cook evenly :(
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Razzano

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a different brand. We love the options of the quesadilla maker. We have made so many meals, snacks and desserts. Easy to use, clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my kids love quesadillas. It works great, the pockets are deep enough to add anything you want and you get a restaurant style quesadilla. It is simple to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shurts

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: I do love my new kitchen gadget. But after using it max of 4 times the black button or whatever. Broke completely off. So I’m not so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Tried to cook with this again...will not brown at all and will have to donate it to someone because I do not have orig. box or receipt from amazon. Definitely would not recommend this it does not brown the tortilla at all on either side and are soft and soggy even after heating it twice to try and get it to cook.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: Quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: This quesadilla maker is wonderful and is easy to use. It takes no time for it to heat up and clean afterwards. Highly recommend for anyone who wants fast and delicious quesadillas
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Seth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it can’t clothes the lid
customer_reviews.text: Got for my dad and he tried using it and the lid wouldn’t close right while cooking it. He then tried a plain cheese one thinking maybe it would work with it instead and still same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this exact one before but lost it while moving. Got it 4 days ago and the second time I went to use it the clip/black piece busted! Kind of hard to keep tight without it. Not sure what to do so disappointed I was so happy to get one again dang it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigha Marie Marty

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings on this it is a great size it is larger than the 1st made ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings on this it is a great size it is larger than the 1st made ones made but it doesn’t have a grease catcher like the other brands and that is a huge drawback. The latch also isn’t as sturdy as our previous one. It does serve its purpose just is missing some features other brands do have.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases so far
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a gift for my mom and we used it for a family dinner, it was so much fun to use! It worked perfectly, easy instructions, easy to clean and the quesadillas came out really crispy and you can even load them up! I will probably buy myself one at some point. She said it was one of the best gifts she had gotten! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This essentially is a wonderful product. I used it one time though and the closure broke. I can still use it but it doesn’t work as good.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Keller shuler

customer_reviews.title: Best Quesadilla maker I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other Quesadilla makers in the past. This is my first George Forman anything. This product is heavy duty and it works great With the other makers I have purchased the handle to click the unit closed usually breaks off very easily, but I dont see that as a problem with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Latch broke/cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The front black latch broke on 1st use and the manufacturer failed to respond to my email. The rest of the product seems to be well made and the cast iron plates are very easy to clean. Just the latch was cheap and ineffective. Also the feet slide around very easily, especially when the latch is broke making the product open off balance causing the product to turn/slide.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Very shallow pockets so it'll squish out almost everything you try to cook. Base is very unstable and the latch is a time bomb waiting to break.
customer_reviews.author: imnoangel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. We go this to make things easier and quicker to make quesadillas, but it wasn't quicker, you can't add much ingredients inside and it's a pain to get it to close tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kohl-Timko

customer_reviews.title: A vegetarian ' s dream....
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!!! So easy to use. It is stated in the manual not to force closed or apply excessive force, so I was very careful. It worked out great for me. I thought I would not get a good result because the lid was not closed all the way, but it turned out perfectly. I recently became vegetarian and this thing is the answer to my prayers. Love and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nachelle edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good but far from great
customer_reviews.text: Operates fine and works well, however latch made of brittle plastic broke off in pieces after first use. Maker was not over loaded if anything fillings where on light side for first test. One has to hold down cover whilst cooking with oven mit. A bit of a pain but manageable. If the latch was not an issue 5 stars all day but 3 stars at best for a product that failed mechanically on first use
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS KELLER

customer_reviews.title: Returned item
customer_reviews.text: Well was too shallow to add as much food as I like in a quesadilla. But very convenient to return and customer service was great. Would not hesitate to order future products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Genung

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It makes a mess behind it on the counter, but other than that works great, easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Meranda Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love it but don’t love cleaning it
customer_reviews.text: Love making quesadillas with the Gorge Forman quesadilla maker. Very difficult to clean and kind of makes a mess. Other than that we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I just hate when the cheese seeps out into the little ledge you can't really clean, I try using a tooth pick. However, favorite gadget we have, used weekly. We enjoy this while camping as well. Eggs & cheese, chicken quesadilla,cheese quesadilla. Family favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It's just really big
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use, easy to clean. It heats up quickly and cooks just as fast. The only thing is its really big. Not bulky, just BIG
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It works well and is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the price and it works very well. I just wish that I could control the temperature settings. But it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Awkba Suey

customer_reviews.title: Could be deeper to make juicy quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: Not deep enough, the quesadilla’s have to be really thin and the toppings has to be spread really thin for the top to close, I expected better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie shakur

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm good quesadillas!
customer_reviews.text: Fun to make quesadillas with, just wish it had some sort of timer device so all my quesadillas would come out the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Handle seems not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: it would be better not to add those adjustment from the handle, it seems like hadle will fall apart from the product, better to add sturdy handle anyway you have to push down the plates to have a good cook of the bread.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean very well.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks a quesadilla OK but not great. Biggest complaint I have with this is cleaning it. When cooking a quesadilla cheese tend to leak out a little and down the crack around the edge with no way to clean it out without tearing apart the machine. I think I will continue to cook quesadilla's on the stove top until they come up with a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Noeldner

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for making Quick Meals
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to make a quesadilla on this. Just place the tortilla on the hot bottom and put in the fillings and cover it up with another tortilla. I use raw uncooked tortillas and they come out perfect. Only reason why this gets 4 stars is because the non-stick is not detachable for cleaning purposes. Cleaning is not hard, but removing would have helped put it in the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: Varun Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so the kids can make their own creations. They love putting the tortilla on there and putting their favorite fixings on there and it makes the outside crunchy. This is a great friday night idea for easy dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mediger

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, however, it doesn’t lock and the price flaps around. It’s also hard to cook the quesadillas evenly. Overall it’s just okay.
customer_reviews.author: N. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money
customer_reviews.text: I have a George Forman grill and decided to get this because I love quesadillas and wanted to make them for the family. Well it’s cheaply made not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make dinners, and it was a great ways to use left over chicken and spinach etc. really easy to use. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I was weary as some reviews were not good. We have had this for a few months now and works Well. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Cole

customer_reviews.title: Makes lunch time quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my George Foreman! We use it for quickly making healthy chicken and/or fish! A must have for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lozano

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR MORE THAN QUESADILLAS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it looked like it had deeper pockets. I can use tortillas or flavored wraps to create all kinds of pocket sandwiches even though it is not advertised as such. It is super easy to clean up, just wipe with a damp cloth. I also use it to create pocket snacks for breakfast with my coffee. One recipe is to put a 1/4 inch slice of cream cheese in each pocket area. Thinly slice an apple and distribute over the cream cheese. Sprinkle with cinnamon and cook. I try to eat low sugar, but you might want to sprinkle some brown sugar too. It is way more versatile than just quesadillas.
customer_reviews.author: V. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I live it for hot sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use it to make quesadillas because I don’t know how to make quesadillas, but I use it to make grill and hot sandwiches. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lavigne verty

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Cuts your tortilla in 6 equal pieces, so they are small... wish it cut them in 4 so portions would be similar to a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience and price
customer_reviews.text: I love making quesadillas. This machine works great. The issues I have are when you go to latch the cover shut the locking handle feels very flimsy and if you over fill your quesadilla it is time consuming to clean all the nooks and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This quesadilla maker is getting tons of use this summer and I highly recommend it! It's easy to use and clean. After 30 or so uses I will say that somehow the latch portion of the machine melted and fell off (see photos). Luckily it still latches so it properly presses the quesadilla. Because of that issue is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, make restaurant worthy quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: Love this quesadilla maker! Have purchased numerous times for gift for everyone and anyone. My kids love chicken quesadillas, chicken, cheese & alittle bit of Italian dressing. YUMMMMYYYYY
customer_reviews.author: Megan  schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Viva George!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Quesadilla maker in six year. This is better quality and less money than my first one. I don't use the ready light. I cook until the tortillas look golden brown. By that time the ready light might have cycled on and off twice. I also like to pre-cook the tortillas before I load them with goodness in order to get them a little crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Kentucky (the original)

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great crispy quesadilla.
customer_reviews.text: Warms up fast and makes a nice browned quesadilla. Nice score marks to make dividing quesadilla easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: If You Like Quesadillas - This Is The One
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Use shredded cheese sparingly, otherwise the cheese will drool out like water. I recommend using small pieces of cheese and placing them strategically. The so called "GREEN" light is only green when it is out. When it is on it is "Orange." You must keep an eye on the quesadilla. If not, the cheese will melt all over the place. The unit is "ON" as long as it is plugged in. To turn the unit off you must pull the plug. I'm happy with my purchase and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pifas

customer_reviews.title: Not very hot...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get very hot so you don't get a very warm or crispy quesadilla. Otherwise it would be great. Wish I could return it, but it's too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: We got a quesadilla maker as a wedding gift (10 years ago) and loved it. When it broke, we couldn’t find the same style/brand so tried this one and have loved it. Easier to clean than our first one (literally wipes clean with a wet rag) and the heating time is quick so dinner is ready in a snap. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to clean between all the grooves but it works great & it’s used a lot. Handle was cheap & broke off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quesadilla maker
customer_reviews.text: Great quesadilla maker. Very pleased we use this multiple nights a week. Cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dane Witch

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself works ok. Gets really hot. It would be nice to have a timer on it or automatic shut off. My biggest complaint is this must have the worlds shortest power cord in the word. I am completely limited to where I can use it due to this and it makes me honestly want to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Makes great quesadilla's
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my teenage son. He love's it. It's simple to use and he loves that it toast the tortilla just enough to give it a little crunch. The only negative and it's not that bad, is that when adding chicken the tortilla is so thick the lid won't shut. It still cooks but one side is cooked a little more than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this easy to use quesadilla maker. I use the rice tortillas from Trader Joes. For those that have trouble cleaning the maker, I use the coconut spray on the pan before I use it. After I used the tortilla maker I used a napkin to clean off the plates. It was very easy to clean. I do not recommend putting any sauce inside the quesadilla has it will become very messy. Hope this helps with your decision.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean up & easy to store! I used mine so much that I gifted it to a few married couples as well!
customer_reviews.author: JNHunt

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the larger 10 inch quesadilla makers. I love it , it’s amazing & I would buy it again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Good for quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and quick cleanup. Perfect for quesadillas at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance when you need a quick dinner fix
customer_reviews.text: There's just the two of us and this quesadilla maker makes such a difference we can make a quick dinner and not have to get out of a bunch of other dishes and pots and pans we love this Appliance for ease-of-use ease of cleanup great product
customer_reviews.author: burplepatti

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: lid doesn't seem to close all the way but may be that is the way it is supposed to be- works great
customer_reviews.author: stovercandy

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use! High quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and great price! So easy to use and make very quickly the best quesadillas! YUM!! I bought one for my grandsons for Christmas and they absolutely love it because is it so easy to use! I also bought another one for me to have at the house because it makes a quick easy meal!
customer_reviews.author: June C. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking
customer_reviews.text: Cooks the bottom much more than the top. The problem is in the design of the unit. The top is at an angle unless the quesadilla is extremely thin.
customer_reviews.author: James knight

customer_reviews.title: Great grill. Makes quesadillas quickly with little prep.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must. They dont last forever, but if you want quesadillas you need one. This model is as good or better than the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Makes Quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: This is the third GF maker we have bought over the years. It is easy to clean and we use it weekly. The last one I accidentally broke the lid but it was still going strong. Very happy with these makers!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.
